title: Do You Guys Use Movement Speed Quints?
body: Let me hear your opinions about movement speed quints.My friends think I'm "low-elo" because I use them because for my friends they don't need speed boost to do well.I personally always use movement speed quints except for some assasin champions like zed etc.I ALWAYS use movement speed quints(x3) when I play jungle champs like lee sin,udyr and volibear etc.I feel like it helps me catch up to the champions that flash out and stuff.I am also more confident when i'm using them during the ganking phase.When I play Lee Sin with MS quints on,ganking feels easier to execute(same  goes for other champions like udyr and volibear etc).Now I don't really care what my friends say about my rune preference but what do you guys think? Is it "low-elo" to use movement speed quints?

replies.body:
If I was having a race with someone then yes I would but otherwise probably not. Unless I was {{champion:120}}  since he gains attack damage from his **bonus** move speed. But, otherwise I probably wouldn't waste my IP on them.

P.S. I used bold on the word 'bonus' because some Summoners don't realize that he only gains from bonus move speed not overall move speed.

> [{quoted}](name=mutley,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=elvfov21,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-11-10T07:50:51.961+0000)
>
> If I was having a race with someone then yes I would but otherwise probably not. Unless I was {{champion:120}}  since he gains attack damage from his **bonus** move speed. But, otherwise I probably wouldn't waste my IP on them.
> 
> P.S. I used bold on the word 'bonus' because some Summoners don't realize that he only gains from bonus move speed not overall move speed.

When I play jungle I always use them,it makes ganking a whole lot easier and also if the enemy flashes to the other side of the wall chasing them is no problem.

those are pretty tempting to use but every champ in the game does well without them. you might think warwick could run them but then when his E is triggered its just overkill. anyone else using them is just....not efficient. a jungler is constantly fighting i dont want to waste 3 quint spaces for some movespeed. its probably better on supports when they get mobi boots and run around warding and catching %%%%s out. with tier 1 boots max, 3 movespeed quints give you no more than 18 movespeed. for 3 quints......thats 6 movespeed per quint........6 movespeed over 4 armour, 4.5 attack speed, 2.25 ad, 5 ap. its just not that worth it. if you wanna play fast champs just play support or jung where getting mobi boots makes you even faster as well as it being pretty viable on them

shaco and hecarim or hide and seek are only real viable options for them.

Only shaco because the mobility helps him when he is running around invis, if only slightly, though i rather attackspeed
One of my friends uses them on {{champion:120}} makes sense....
Yeah I use them from time to time.
Buy them from the shop go to ur runes page  click movement speed quints and there u have it that how i use movement speed quint

On junglers and some supports yes, I like them. But they aren't necessary. Depends on your play style.

I personally use them on champions like {{champion:77}} {{champion:33}} {{champion:106}} {{champion:72}}  and sometimes {{champion:19}} {{champion:102}} {{champion:57}} depending on who is on the enemy team

Attack Speed Marks with MS Quints usually

I know some people use them with {{champion:120}} too, but that again is personal preference. I prefer AD Quints with Hec.

> [{quoted}](name=BarryButcher,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=elvfov21,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-11-09T08:21:41.584+0000)
>
> On junglers and some supports yes, I like them. But they aren't necessary. Depends on your play style.
> 
> I personally use them on champions like {{champion:77}} {{champion:33}} {{champion:106}} {{champion:72}}  and sometimes {{champion:19}} {{champion:102}} {{champion:57}} depending on who is on the enemy team
> 
> Attack Speed Marks with MS Quints usually
> 
> I know some people use them with {{champion:120}} too, but that again is personal preference. I prefer AD Quints with Hec.

Yeah and my friends call me "low-elo" for my playstyle.I knew I was not the only one who used movement speed quints
